description:
Scientists that become Data Scientists in companies bring with them a
particular academic baggage that defines the way they think, work and
communicate in the new environment. In this talk, I will talk about pros
and cons associated with this baggage, drawing from my personal story of
transitioning to Data Science with a focus on how we love data and how
we can improve communication with stakeholders through better data
visualization and storytelling.

**Feedback form:** https://python.it/feedback-1800

in \_\_on **Saturday 4 May** at 14:15 `**See
schedule** </en/sprints/schedule/pycon10/>`__
title: From Science with (Data) Love: make others love data the way you do.
